text: A deer fleeing hunters came to a cave where he didn't know a lion lived. Going into it to hide, he fell into the lion's clutches. Seeing himself hopelessly lost, he exclaimed: "Woe to me! Fleeing from men, I fell into the clutches of a fierce animal. When you run from a problem, let the outcome be no worse.
title: La cierva en la gruta del león
author: nan Esopo
